#summary Components of the Forms Framework

= Reference-Template =
 * frw_ref.fmb

This is the class-library of the Forms-Framework. All objects of the forms-template are subclassed from here.

All objects are linked into objectgroups. This objectgroups are subclassed to the forms-template and from there they are copied into each form-module.


= PL/SQL-Libraries =
 * frw_lib.pll

This is the [plsql_library_frw_lib main library] in the framework. All forms are attached to this library.

 * frw_kit.pll
uses frw_lib.pll

under construction


= Forms-Template =
 * frw_template.fmb

This is the [forms_frw_template main-template] for all developed form-modules.
